lead_paragraph: ANGELO--John. Manhattan Theatre Club mourns the passing of our friend John Angelo. We extend our heartfelt condolences to our cherished former Board member Judy Hart Angelo and the entire Angelo family. Lynne Meadow, Artistic Director Barry Grove, Executive Producer David C. Hodgson, Chairman of the Board Peter J. Solomon, Chairman Emeritus 1/3
